prompt_base: colossal bio-android, dark emerald green chitinous exoskeleton, black spots, regal head horns, giant compound insectoid eyes, biomechanical wings, menacing expression, 8k cinematic photo, dramatic lighting
feature_prompt: wet biological sheen on chitin, intricate segmented plating, sharp focus on compound eye texture, hyper-realistic bio-armor, detailed alien biology, sharp claws, intimidating presence
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, human face, fleshy skin, organic texture, smooth shell, low quality, blurry wings, deformed, too small
